message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it offers.
Hi Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $150 is my initial offer, I could come down to $130.  I'm confident this product will be valuable for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $110. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
